text: Hanki Elaija'a kini nera amanage huno asmi'ne, Ra Anumzamo'a amanage hu'ne, Israelia Anumzama mani'neana Agripintima antahi'zana eri'zankura na'ante kato vaheka'a huzmantanke'za Ekroni vahe anumzana Balsebabuntegatira antahintahia ome erikura vu'naze. E'inahu kavukvama hu'nana zantera tamagerfa hunka hazenkema erinkama tafete'ma mase'nampintira onkanamrenka frigahane.
